DiscountPercentage.title: DiscountPercentage
DiscountPercentage.description: The discount percentage that should be applied to the QuoteLineItem. The input should be a number with up to 2 decimals. Maximum value is 100.

QuoteId.title: QuoteId
QuoteId.description: 18 character Id of the quote record.

QuoteLineItemId.title: QuoteLineItemId
QuoteLineItemId.description: 18 character Id of the QuoteLineItem record on which this action acts. This is not the Product2 Id.
